name: sky-attack
caption: Sky Attack

effect.short: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  [Critical hit chance]{mechanic:critical-hit-chance} is one level higher than normal.  Has a 30% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic:flinch}.

This move cannot be selected by []{move:sleep-talk}.

flavorText:
A second-turn attack move where critical hits land
more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
